name: perl-datetime-format-builder

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Create DateTime parser classes and objects.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-datetime
dependencies.description: DateTime - A date and time object for Perl

dependencies.name: perl-datetime-format-strptime
dependencies.description: Parse and format strp and strf time patterns

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-format-mysql
dependent_to.description: Parse and format MySQL dates and times

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-format-oracle
dependent_to.description: Parse and format Oracle dates and timestamps

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-format-pg
dependent_to.description: Parse and format PostgreSQL dates and times
